name: The WORST Dating Sim
description:
This is my first project kinda. I uploaded my test to itch as well, so play that if you want. I want to make this game kind of long with plenty of jokes.

You play Bill, a non-binary emo panromantic looking for love. Bill will have to pick between Shadow the Hedgehog, the angry emo. Minecraft Steve, the responsible mom. Dante, who is definitely not a serial killer. Nagito (Don't pick this one). Or Arthur Morgan, the cowboy kid.

I strive to provide the worst playing experience possible. Everything about this game has been designed to be as terrible as possible. From the royalty free lofi music to the terrible spritework, this game is the WORST
